message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. This is a one-time offer, so let me know if you're interested!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I really appreciate it.  However, $110 is a bit higher than I was hoping to spend. I'd be willing to pay $105 for it.  What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $105 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can sell the product to you for $108. This is my final offer, so let me know if it works for you!
